dcterms:creator: I. Mordatch
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A grounded communication environment consisting of N agents and L landmarks in a two-dimensional world where agents can take physical actions and communicate actions to other agents.
dcterms:title: Grounded Communication Environment

dcterms:creator: I. Mordatch
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A cooperative navigation environment where agents must work together to reach a set of L landmarks, observing the relative positions of other agents and landmarks.
dcterms:title: Cooperative Navigation

dcterms:creator: I. Mordatch
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A predator-prey environment where one group of agents must chase another, showcasing competitive dynamics.
dcterms:title: Predator-Prey

dcterms:creator: I. Mordatch
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: An adversarial communication environment where a speaker agent must communicate a message to a listener agent, while an adversary tries to intercept the message.
dcterms:title: Covert Communication

dcterms:creator: I. Mordatch
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A competitive environment where agents must keep each other away from a target landmark, requiring physical actions and coordination.
dcterms:title: Keep-Away
